channel.title: Where are the network XML's?
channel.description:
I am following the instructions [here](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Importing_Whonix_VM_Templates) trying to set up the gateway, and it is telling me to type these commands into terminal:
virsh -c qemu:///system net-define external_network*.xml virsh -c qemu:///system net-define internal_network*.xml
The instructions say these xml files should be in the gateway folder that I decompressed, but when i decompressed it I only get two files:
Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.1.libvirt.xz Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.1.xml
Does anyone know where I might be able to find the missing files?

item.title: Where are the network XML's?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Its included in the gateway archive.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are the network XML's?
item.dc:creator: banana
item.description:
I verified the download and the signature is good. I’m still not sure where to find the network XML.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are the network XML's?
item.dc:creator: banana
item.description:
Thanks for the fast replies. I did not verify the downloads, will do that now.

After going back to the instructions for up to version 13, I see it says to enter this command:

virsh -c qemu:///system net-define Whonix_network*.xml

I cannot see a Whonix_network*.xml file. I will verify the download and make sure it isn’t corrupted.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are the network XML's?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
That is from section “New Settings for Whonix 14+” which does not apply yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are the network XML's?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Did you verify that the integrity of the downloaded files isn’t corrupted?

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: Where are the network XML's?
item.dc:creator: banana
item.description:
I am following the instructions here trying to set up the gateway, and it is telling me to type these commands into terminal:

virsh -c qemu:///system net-define external_network*.xml
virsh -c qemu:///system net-define internal_network*.xml

The instructions say these xml files should be in the gateway folder that I decompressed, but when i decompressed it I only get two files:

Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.1.libvirt.xz
Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.1.xml

Does anyone know where I might be able to find the missing files?
